The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 12 September is 71,385 (8,227.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 07 September, there were 2,286 new confirmed cases (263.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 August, there were 2,149 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 6% (137 extra cases).
